name: Rogue (itch)
description:
This is just a little space shooter game I made to learn more about Game Maker Studio 2. At the moment it just has an endless mode where enemies will keep spawning, try and get the best score you can. Feel free to leave your score in the comments!

Credits:

Programming - https://twitter.com/SirRemanos

Art - https://www.scirra.com/users/kenney

Music - http://www.nosoapradio.us
